metadata.title: CVE-2022-4206 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A sensitive information leak issue has been discovered in all versions ofDAST API scanner from 1.6.50 prior to 2.0.102, exposing the Authorizationheader in the vulnerability report

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
